2.name: Flame Star
2.text: use the heavenly power to incinerate

3.name: Drama Absorption
3.text: unleash power from an unlikely source

2.name: Dynastic Stance
2.text: summon Royal Arms to rain down on {}

4.name: Armiger Unleashed
4.text: hurl all 13 Royal Arms with the true power of kings at {}

5.name: Royal Cleave
5.text: cloak Engine Blade in magic aura and slash {}

6.name: Apocalypsis
6.text: draw Royal Arms as multiple bolts in a cylindrical formation and shoot {}

7.name: Gungnir
7.text: summon Odin to hurl Gungnir with incredible force at {}

1.info: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
1.name: Cross Poison

2.info: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
2.name: Flamethrower

3.info: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
3.name: Aqua Tail

4.info: An attack that inflicts the damage by shaking the ground. It is useless against Flying type Pokémon.
4.name: Earthquake

5.info: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
5.name: Shadow Ball

7.info: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
7.name: Megahorn

8.info: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
8.name: Flash Cannon

9.info: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
9.name: Thunder Punch

10.info: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
10.name: Ice Beam

11.info: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.
11.name: Moonblast

12.info: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
12.name: Hydro Pump

13.info: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
13.name: Hydro Pump

14.info: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
14.name: Horn Leech

15.info: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.
15.name: Heal Bell

16.info: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
16.name: Poison Jab

17.info: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
17.name: Fire Blast

18.info: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
18.name: Draco Meteor

19.info: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.
19.name: Dragon Pulse

20.info: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.
20.name: Aromatherapy

21.info: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.
21.name: Refresh

22.info: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
22.name: Recover

23.info: A move that leaves the target poisoned.
23.name: Poison Powder

24.info: A move that leaves the target poisoned.
24.name: Poison Powder

25.info: The target is shot with a needle drenched in poison. This may also poison the target.
25.name: Poison Sting

26.info: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
26.name: Calm Mind

27.name: Close Combat
27.info: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

2.name: Moon Princess Halation
2.info: A beautiful light stream. 10% chance to lower Defense.

3.name: Rainbow Moon Heartache :rainbow::heart:
3.info: Deadly ribbons fly at the target and zap them. High chance of a critical hit.

4.name: Moon Gorgeous Meditation
4.info: Projects the opponent into a kaleidoscope and shatters it. Highly confusing. (30%)

5.name: Starlight Honeymoon Therapy Kiss
5.info: Deals damage and heals the user in the process.
5.text: soak everything in a pink light

6.name: Silver Moon Crystal Power Therapy Kiss
6.info: Deals damage and heals all statuses of the user.
6.text: soak everything in a blinding light

7.name: Bubble Spray
7.info: Only the user can see through the mist and bubbles. Halves the target's accuracy.

8.name: Shine Aqua Illusion
8.info: Looks pretty. 10% of lowering Speed by 20%.

9.name: Shine Snow Illusion
9.info: Attacks with a small snowstorm. 50% chance to freeze the target.

11.name: Mercury Aqua Mirage
11.info: Looks pretty. High chance of flinch and a critical hit.
11.text: hit {} over and over with watery blasts

12.name: Burning Mandala
12.info: Deals damage. High chance for a burn.

13.name: Fire Soul
13.info: Deals damage. 10% chance for a burn.

14.name: Mars Snake Fire
14.info: Conjures a fire snake with a 20% chance of burn.

15.name: Mars Flame Sniper
15.info: 20% of a burn and/or a critical hit.

16.name: Fire Soul Bird
16.info: Upgraded Fire Soul with a bird. 20% chance of a burn.

23.name: Jupiter Oak Evolution
23.info: Deals damage. High chance of a critical hit.

25.name: Hissatsu Love-Me Moon Chain
25.info: Deals damage in a disguise. Very high chance of consfusion.
25.text: hit {} with a lovely chain of moonlight

26.name: Venus Love-Me Chain
26.text: hit {} with a lovely chain of light :heart:

28.name: Crescent Beam Shower
28.info: Deals damage. Increased chance of a critical hit.

29.name: Venus Love and Beauty Shock
29.info: Deals love damage. 50% chance of paralysis.

31.name: Venus Wink Chain Sword
31.info: Deals damage. Increased chance of a critical hit.

32.name: Space Turbulence
32.info: Deals damage. 20% chance of lowering Sp.Def by 20%.

33.name: Space Sword Blaster
33.info: Deals damage. High chance of a critical hit.

34.name: Deep Submerge
34.info: Deals damage. 20% chance to lower Defense by 10%.

35.name: Submarine Violon Tide
35.info: Deals damage. 30% chance of lowering Attack by 20%.

37.name: Dead Scream
37.info: 30% chance of lowering Sp.Def by 30%. Cannot be a critical hit.

39.name: Silence Glave Surprise
39.info: Deals damage. Very high chance of a critical hit.

40.name: Death Reborn Revolution
40.info: Deals damage and heals the user by the same amount.

41.name: Pink Sugar Heart Attack
41.info: Deals damage. Very high chance of flinching.

43.name: Silver Moon Crystal Eternal Power
43.info: Deals damage and takes recoil equal to half the damage dealt.

44.name: Moon Twilight Flash
44.info: Always flinches the target with a powerful flash.

45.name: Submarine Reflection
45.info: Reflects damage on the next turn.

46.name: Silent Wall
46.info: Protects from all damage on the next turn.
